SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddMoodFragment
This fragment allows users to create a new mood event by selecting a mood type, providing a reason, and optionally uploading an image.
CircularImageView
This file is for user profile image with drawing and set images user profile image from firebase cropped into circle
Comment
Class representing a comment on a mood event, stores information about comment
CommentManager
Manager class for handling comments related to mood events
CommentsAdapter
Adapter for displaying comments in a RecyclerView, binds each comment object to a view shows username and comment text.
DbOpResultHandler<TResult>
Organizes the logic used to handle task operation results.
DbUtils
Do not directly call query methods in here within fragments - use the related data manager instead.
DbUtilTest
Runs tests for DbUtil content.
EditMoodFragment
This fragment allows users to update details of a previously created mood event including the mood type, reason, social situation, and associate image.
EditMoodFragmentInflater
This class provides utility methods for inflating and setting up UI components in the EditMoodFragment.
FollowersAdapter
This class is an adapter for displaying a list of followers in a RecyclerView.
FollowersAdapter.OnFollowerClickListener
Interface for handling follower click events.
FollowersAdapter.ViewHolder
sub class viewholder for holding follwer items
FollowersListFragment
This fragment displays a list of followers for the current user.
Following
This file is to save the following relationship between users stored in firebase Uses getters and setters for follow details querying
FollowingAdapter
This class is an adapter for displaying a list of users that the current user is following in a RecyclerView.
FollowingAdapter.OnFollowingActionListener
Interface for handling following actions.
FollowingAdapter.ViewHolder
holds user details in UI
FollowingFragment
Allow user to see a feed of their followed user's moods (most recent) Current Issues: None
FollowingListFragment
This fragment displays a list of users that the current user is following.
FollowingManager
Following-specific helper functions.
FollowRequestsAdapter
This adapter is responsible for displaying a list of follow requests in a RecyclerView.
FollowRequestsAdapter.FollowRequestListener
Interface for handling follow request actions.
FollowRequestsFragment
This fragment displays a list of follow requests received by the current user.
IDbData
Data that are expected to be **retrieved** by the database should implement this, So the document ID can be automatically inserted while retrieving the data.
LocationManager
This file is to manage the location of a user using geopoints upon permission request
LoginFragment
Fragment responsible for handling the login functionality in the application Implements login process with validation and feedback to the user.
MainActivity
MainActivity for the SegFault Squad application.
Map_api
This class interacts with OpenStreetMap API for geolocation coding (geocoding and reverse geocoding)
Map_api.GeocodingListener
Listener interface for receiving the results of a geocoding request.
Map_api.ReverseGeocodingListener
Listener interface for receiving the results of a reverse geocoding request.
MapFragment
This fragment displays a map where users can view mood events associated with themselves and their followers.
MapPlaceholderView
This custom view serves as a placeholder for the map, allowing for the visualization of mood markers.
MapPlaceholderView.MoodMarker
Class representing a mood marker on the map.
MockDb
This class will help setup mock database before unit tests.
MoodAdapter
Adapter for the mood events list in the MyMoodHistoryFragment Issues: None
MoodAdapter.OnMoodClickListener
interface for MoodAdapter class
MoodAdapter.UserCallback
Interface for receiving user data from Firestore
MoodAnalyticsFragment
Mood Analytics fragment (screen).
MoodDetailsFragment
A Fragment that displays detailed information about a specific mood event.
MoodEvent
This file is to save the details of a mood event upon retrieval from firebase Uses getters and setters for mood details querying
MoodEvent.MoodType
Enum mood type attribute to select different emojis
MoodEvent.SocialSituation
Enum social situations attribute to select different situations
MoodEventComment
Represents particular comment on a mood event, file used for storing and managing it comments associated with specific mood events.
MoodEventManager
Encapsulates MoodEvent's related interactions with database.
MoodEventManager.MoodEventFilter
Define all mood event filters as per user wants
MoodEventManagerTest
Runs tests for MoodEventManager content.
MoodHistoryAndMoodEventTest
This test tests for the mood history display and filtering;
new mood event / modify mood event are also tested here by convenience.
MyMoodHistoryFragment
Mood History fragment (Not really, just loads of startup) Issues: None
ProfileFragment
This file is for the user profile details stored in firebase Uses getters and setters to query user profile information
SearchedProfileFragment
This file is for the profile details of the user searched stored in firebase Uses getters and setters to query profile information for the user searched
SearchResultAdapter
This file is for the searching users among the list of users in a recyclerview handles user clicks into the view
SearchResultAdapter.OnUserClickListener
Interface to handle user click events from the search result list.
SplashFragment
This fragment cycles through set of emojis and displays them upon start of app navigates to login screen or homescreen based on user login status
TestLoginUtil
Contains misc navigation features that can be used during fragment test
User
This file is to save the details of a user upon retrieval from firebase Uses getters and setters for user details querying
UserAndFollowingTest
Runs tests for User-related and Following content.
UserFollowingTest
This test tests for features related to following.
UserManager
This file contains authentication and functionality for loading an user's data from DB.
